casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Thomas Joseph BERGHELLO. No. 478P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. James N. Freeman, Jr., for Berghello. John F. Oates, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of September 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
